title: LF ADC/MID For Clash
body:
Looking for +1 for clash, need someone who can play mid OR adc. The team is mainly just golds with a diamond smurf.

We arnt starting till 8:45PM though. Add "Pet Me" in-game if intrested

replies.body: hey i am silver 2 but i am sure i can hold my own against gold players. i play jhin and ashe mostly
